  deploy_to_production:
    name: deploy_production
    environment:
      name: produccion
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: [build_and_deploy, run_sonarqube]
    steps:
      - run: echo now we take master branch
      - run: echo this is ready
      
      - name: Use another branch
        uses: TallerDeDesarrollo-UCB-START/StartApp-Frontend@master
        env:
          REPO: self
          BRANCH: master
          FOLDER: public # The directory where your assets are generated
          GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }} # GitHub will automatically add this - you don't need to bother getting a token
          MESSAGE: "Build: ready"
